text: “Israelɨn gumaziba, ia en akuragh! Gumazir kam, en gumazamizibagh asɨghasɨghasa, gumazir igharaziba ko nguibar igharaziba bar men sure gami. Egha Moses Osirizir Araziba ko Godɨn Dɨpenim gasɨghasɨgha mɨgei. A uaghan Grighɨn gumaziba inigha Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn mɨriamɨn aven ghua God ua bagha inabazir dɨpenim gamima a Godɨn damazimɨn mɨze.”
